hints.content:
$\greenD{?}-\goldE{435}= \purpleD{210}$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point question mark to point 210 is labeled, minus 435.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2445f56b09e21af3fb655edec625ec04e28e85f9)

What number can we subtract $\goldE{435}$ from and be left with $\purpleD{210}?$

We can add $\goldE{435}$ to $\purpleD{210}$ to find the missing number.

$\begin{align}{\goldE{435}}&\\
\underline{+\purpleD{210}} &\\
\greenD{645}&\end{align}$

![The same number line as above, with the question mark replaced with 645 and an arrow from 210 to 645 labeled plus 435](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1cf750a0907f1557a97b8469bdc726629e825b89)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?**

 [[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] $- \, 435=210$
